steps: step 2: Click on link teamProjectSettings -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/settings'
step 3: Click on link teamProjectScriptRepositories -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project'
step 6: Click on link teamProjectZipRepo -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project/*'
step 10: Click on button scheduleTestRun -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-planning'
step 12: Click on link teamProjectSchedules -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/grid'
step 13: Click on button scriptRepositoryAll -> Navigate to page ''
step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
